scripts.fbinstant-development: cross-env NODE_ENV='development' parcel build ./src/Wrapper.ts --no-cache --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-optimize --dist-dir dist && node utils/postprocess.js && node utils/playcanvas-download.js && node utils/fbinstant.js
scripts.fbinstant-production: cross-env NODE_ENV='production' parcel build ./src/Wrapper.ts --no-cache --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-optimize --dist-dir dist && node utils/postprocess.js && node utils/playcanvas-download.js && node utils/fbinstant.js
scripts.playcanvas: cross-env NODE_ENV='playcanvas' parcel build ./src/Wrapper.ts --no-cache --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-optimize --dist-dir dist && node utils/postprocess.js && node utils/playcanvas-upload.js
scripts.local: cross-env NODE_ENV='local' parcel build ./src/Wrapper.ts --no-cache --no-content-hash --no-source-maps --no-optimize --dist-dir dist && node utils/postprocess.js && node utils/playcanvas-download.js && node utils/local.js
scripts.configure-development: npx replicant environment edit --appName snappy-jump --stage dev
scripts.configure-production: npx replicant environment edit --appName snappy-jump --stage prod
